short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lempod helps you reach a much bigger audience with your content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is it for?

lempod helps you 10x your LinkedIn post views so you can reach a much bigger audience with your content.

How does this work?

lempod is the biggest marketplace of LinkedIn Engagement Pods where other LinkedIn content makers automatically support each other with mutual engagement.

How to use lempod?

1- Install lempod Chrome Extension
2- Join relevant pods (or create your own pod and invite people)
3- Share your post to lempod, so other pod members will support you with likes and comments.

How do we handle your data?

In order to use lempod, you need to login to your LinkedIn account so lempod can have access to it in order to perform some automatic tasks.

Here are the following tasks that can be performed on your behalf when you install lempod:

1- Like and comment from your profile on other people’s posts (ONLY if you are in the same pod - you can also adjust those settings on each pod if you don’t want to perform such actions)
2- Extract the analytics of your own posts (number of likes, views, comments etc…)
